description:
Your simple video editor for creating wow videos

Your simple video editor for creating wow videos
- Easily create clips for your socials, business, or family
- Boost your videos with one-click auto subtitles and other AI tools
- Choose from hundreds of titles, transitions, and music tracks
- Now your videos can speak more languages! In addition to English, you can now instantly translate auto subtitles into Spanish, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Hindi. The easiest way to make your videos get more views and likes from the international audiences.
